short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use ChatGPT applications visible on every page in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the ChatGPT Open Sidepanel Extension!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ChatGPT Open Sidepanel is an easy-to-use Chrome extension that keeps ChatGPT just a click away. With this extension, you can quickly access ChatGPT without cluttering your browser tabs. Whether you’re looking for information or generating creative ideas, ChatGPT will always be right there with you!

Key Features:
------------------------------
Quick Access: Instantly launch ChatGPT from the browser’s side panel.
No More Tab Clutter: Work with ChatGPT directly in the side panel without switching between tabs.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple and elegant design for easy navigation.
Advanced Permission Control: Operates exclusively on the chat.openai.com domain, ensuring a secure and controlled experience.

How to Use?
------------------------------
Add the extension to Chrome.
Click the ChatGPT button in the side panel to start using it instantly!
Manage your ideas, questions, and projects effortlessly.

Why Choose ChatGPT Open Sidepanel?
------------------------------
This extension is designed to boost your productivity and simplify access to ChatGPT. It’s perfect for both personal and professional use. Make ChatGPT an integral part of your browsing experience!
